00001 # Name:    commit.tcl
00002 # Author:  Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00003 # Date:    9/12/2013
00004 
00005 # Read the contents of the version file to get the dot version
00006 source "version.tcl"
00007 
00008 # Get the global ID and local ID
00009 set id [exec hg id -n]
00010 
00011 if {[catch "open version.tcl w" rc]} {
00012   error $rc
00013   exit 1
00014 } else {
00015   puts $rc "set version_major \"$version_major\""
00016   puts $rc "set version_minor \"$version_minor\""
00017   puts $rc "set version_point \"$version_point\""
00018   puts $rc "set version_hgid  \"[string range $id 0 end-1]\""
00019   close $rc
00020 }
